summary: Roman warrior Titus Andronicus (Trevor Peacock) finds himself trapped in a nightmarish cycle of vengeance, misery, and bloodshed.
cast: Paul Davies Prowles|Edward Hardwicke|Walter Brown|Brian Protheroe|Nicholas Gecks|Derek Fuke|Eileen Atkins|Peter Searles|Neil McCaul|Michael Crompton|Hugh Quarshie|Gavin Richards|Crispin Redman|Tom Hunsinger|Michael Packer|Trevor Peacock|Anna Calder-Marshall|Paul Kelly|John Benfield|Deddie Davies|Tim Potter
title: Titus Andronicus
